description:
Asuraman is http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki]`s guardina spirit, the spirit of Ginnikuman erasers he got from capsule machines as a kid. He got seven Asuramans, so he threw away six. The vengeful malice of the six formed a spirit that plots to exact revenge on its host when it gets the chance.
Source: Crunchyroll
name: Asuraman
